extDescription.message: This extension will call you to order on a recurring basis, so that you does not lose sight of the essential goals of your life.

options_onseveriteinput_l1.message: Send a notification every [Enter number] minutes

options_onseveriteinput_l2.message: Confirm to continue every [Enter number] minutes.

options_onseveriteinput_l3.message: Block the page after [Enter number] minutes

options_onseveriteinput_l3_2.message:
Block for how many minutes?
[0 = All the day]

options_onseveriteinput_l4.message: Close the browser after [Enter the number] minutes.

options_onseveriteinput_debutquestion.message: Also warn at the beginning of the access to a blacklisted site?

options_modal_first.message: You have been using our extension for a few days now. How do you rate your experience?

options_modal_good.message: I'm very glad you found this extension useful! Can you support us in any of these ways to encourage us in the developments?

options_modal_bad.message: Can you help us by telling us what will make you more satisfied with our extension?

options_chart_tempsdenavigationenh.message: Browsing time in hours per day

options_sites_consultes.message: Most consulted sites of the week (H)

setlist_listenoire_description.message: Put the distracting sites here. To include all websites, write *.*

setlist_listeblanche_description.message: Allows to ignore a specific part included in the blacklist. Also very useful for "allow nothing except:"

setlist_messageaddtogroup.message: Enter the name of the new group

setlist_messagegroupnameinvalid.message: A group with that name already exists...

setlist_confirmdeletegroup.message:
Are you sure you want to delete this group?
All the lists it contains will be deleted...

setlist_cantdeletegroup.message: You have only one group: You cannot delete it.

setlist_plusieursurl.message: You can add several urls at the same time by separating them with spaces.

setlist_onbeforeunload.message: You should save your changes before exiting

horaire_description.message: During rest periods, severity levels will not apply. No pauses will be active for the next 5 minutes following any changes on rest periods.

horaire_dateinvalide.message: The date you entered is invalid

horaire_periodedeblocage.message: You are currently in a blocking period

horaire_periodedeblocageniveau.message: You are currently in a blocking period. You can only increase the level.

horaire_modeoverdriveinfobulle.message: You will not be able to open your browser until the selected time!

horaire_modeoverdriveconfirmation.message: Are you really sure you want to continue? You will not be able to open your browser until the selected time. Write "YES" to confirm.

horaire_messageconfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to go through with this? You will no longer be able to add items to a white list, decrease severity level or add or change a break period.

content_texteaentrer_1.message: In order for us to practice self-control, we must have a goal.

content_texteaentrer_2.message: We shouldn't always have what we want: it spoils the best of us, doesn't it?

content_texteaentrer_3.message: You decide your own level of involvement.

content_texteaentrer_4.message: Challenge yourself all the days of your life.

content_texteaentrer_5.message: We must have something we are saying yes to, and things that we must say no to.

content_texteaentrer_6.message: Believe that you can whip the enemy, and you have won half the battle.

content_texteaentrer_7.message: When the fight begins within himself, a man's worth something.

content_texteaentrer_8.message: Your success depends mainly upon what you think of yourself and whether you believe in yourself.

content_texteaentrer_9.message: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

content_texteaentrer_10.message: You must have discipline to have fun.

content_texteaentrer_11.message: There's nothing better than achieving your goals, whatever they might be.

content_texteaentrer_12.message: The future is built on what we do every day.

content_texteaentrer_13.message: You cannot expect to achieve new goals or move beyond your present circumstances unless you change.

content_texteaentrer_14.message: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.

content_texteaentrer_15.message: If you aim for nothing, you'll hit it every time.

content_texteaentrer_16.message: You need lofty goals. Then cement it with a great work ethic.

content_texteaentrer_17.message: I am able to leave this website if it is not important.

content_texteaentrer_18.message: Good time management can make me accomplish wonderful things.

content_texteaentrer_19.message: 97 per cent are the people who don't have goals and they end up working for the 3 percent.

content_texteaentrer_20.message: You can't prevent birds from flying over your head, but you can prevent them from building nests in your hair.

content_texteaentrer_21.message: You have power over your mind, realize this.

content_texteaentrer_22.message: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.

content_texteaentrer_23.message: Self-control is the chief element in self-respect.

content_texteaentrer_24.message: If you conquer yourself, then you conquer the world.

content_texteaentrer_25.message: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.

content_texteaentrer_26.message: The ability to subordinate an impulse to a value is the essence of the proactive person.

content_texteaentrer_27.message: The enemy is within the gates; it is our own luxury that we have to contend.

content_texteaentrer_28.message: The biggest enemies of willpower: temptation, self-criticism, and stress.

content_texteaentrer_29.message: How to get rid of ego as dictator and turn it to be in your service, is the trick.

content_texteaentrer_30.message: People will testify against themselves, despite the excuses they come up with.

content_texteaentrer_31.message: Always remember, your focus determines your reality.

content_texteaentrer_32.message: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.

content_texteaentrer_33.message: Our focus is our future and what we focus on will multiply in our life.

content_texteaentrer_34.message: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.

content_texteaentrer_35.message: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.

content_texteaentrer_36.message: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

content_texteaentrer_37.message: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts.

content_texteaentrer_38.message: I think goals should never be easy, they should force you to work.

content_texteaentrer_39.message: You should set goals beyond your reach so you always have something to live for.

content_texteaentrer_40.message: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.

content_texteaentrer_41.message: The danger for most of us isn't that our aim is too high and miss it, but that it is too low and we reach it.

content_texteaentrer_42.message: I am always more interested in what I am about to do than what I have already done.

content_texteaentrer_43.message: Goals are the fuel in the furnace of achievement.

content_texteaentrer_44.message: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

content_texteaentrer_45.message: There are only two rules for being successful. One, figure out exactly what you want to do, and two, do it.

content_texteaentrer_46.message: Life can be pulled by goals just as surely as it can be pushed by drives.

content_texteaentrer_47.message: Prudent, cautious self-control, is wisdom's root.

content_texteaentrer_48.message: What man's mind can create, man's character can control.

content_texteaentrer_49.message: If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self.

content_texteaentrer_50.message: Your brain shall be your servant instead of your master. You will rule it instead of allowing it to rule you.

content_texteaentrer_51.message: He who cannot obey himself will be commanded. That is the nature of living creatures.

content_texteaentrer_52.message: Braver is who overcomes his desires than him who conquers his enemies; for the hardest victory is over self.

content_texteaentrer_53.message: Self-discipline begins with the mastery of your thoughts.

content_texteaentrer_54.message: If you don't control what you think, you can't control what you do.

content_texteaentrer_55.message: Self-discipline enables you to think first and act afterward.

content_texteaentrer_56.message: There never has been, and cannot be, a good life without self-control.

content_texteaentrer_57.message: We improve ourselves by victories over ourselves. There must be contest, and we must win.

content_texteaentrer_58.message: If you lose self-control everything will fall.

content_texteaentrer_59.message: If you can not control yourself to do what needs to be done, do you really think that you will be successful?

content_texteaentrer_60.message: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.

content_texteaentrer_61.message: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.

content_texteaentrer_62.message: Success isn't the result of the amount of time we put in at work, but it's the quality of time we put in.

content_texteaentrer_63.message: A goal without a timeline is just a dream.

content_texteaentrer_64.message: A year from now you may wish you had started today.

content_texteaentrer_65.message: No desired achievement is gained without any goal setting.

content_texteaentrer_66.message: If you don't have big dreams and goals, you'll end up working for someone that does.

content_texteaentrer_67.message: You know that one thing you've always dreamed about? Write it down. Then take the first step. Today.

content_texteaentrer_68.message: Productivity depends on executing important tasks in line with your goals.

content_texteaentrer_69.message: Remember that goals are not wishes that you want to have. They are things that you have to do.

content_texteaentrer_70.message: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That's why it is called the present.

content_notifier_debut.message: You've just entered a blacklisted site.

content_notifier_l1_p1.message: You are on this site since

content_notifier_l2_p1.message: You are on this site since

content_notifier_l2_p4.message: How much more time do you need?

content_notifier_l2_t3.message: Nothing, I don't want to take my time seriously

content_notifier_l2_alert_time.message: Be careful, it's easy to let yourself get away with this.

content_notifier_l2_alert_time_2.message: Sorry, I have to close this window to protect your time.
